english: I'm volunteering at a local charity.
I'm helping to build houses for the homeless.
I'm cleaning up a local park.
I'm working with animals at a shelter.
I'm volunteering my time and skills.
I'm making a difference in my community.
I'm learning new skills through volunteering.
arabic: أكتسب مهارات جديدة من خلال التطوع.

english: I'm meeting new people through volunteering.
arabic: ألتقي بأشخاص جدد من خلال التطوع.

english: Volunteering is a great way to give back.
I'm inspired to volunteer by others.
